item.title: Report E-2025050023
item.description:
Report E-2025050023

  • Incident Date: 2025-03-14
  • City: WINNSBORO
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: EAGLE TRANSPORT CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 8000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Pop's had a tech come out and determine the released was caused form a clogged vent line, resulting in flap issue during delivery. 20 gallons of ulsd was released onto parking lot surface. CDG managed cleanup. Customer will reimburse us for cleanup and accepted responsibility.
